page.title: 16Drama in Turvey
page.content: T.A.T.S. was formed seven years ago. It has proved an enjoyable, enthusiastic and entertaining society. The programme has been varied. Since the first venture of 'Dick Whittington' in 1979, they have performed; Old Tyme Music Hall, the musicals 'Annie get your Gun', 'No No Nanette' and 'Grease', two more pantomimes, two summer plays, readings of prose and poetry in the Church and have taken productions to Sharnbrook and Milton Keynes.T.A.T.S. has providedan opportunity for members to discover and develop many skills, each skill enhancing the final production.So make-up girls, set designers, wardrobe, stage crew,lighting and sound technicians, front of house, box office, props, actors, musicians and producers all share in the pleasure of the audience.
